title: Not secure

title: The app isn’t great and the customer service is awful
text:
The app itself is poorly designed and hard to use. The search works ok but it doesn’t allow booking multiple rooms with different numbers of people in them. 

It appears that the app is just a giant aggregator that leaches money from services without adding much benefit at all, choosing to, instead, defer the resolution of problems to the service provider and offering no real assistance itself. This because evident during a trip to Italy from the US where a mix of upgrades that could not be done through the app and the resolution of unfortunate return flight problems that Booking.com refused to help with caused me real frustration that never got resolved at all. 

And that’s the real problem: booking.com customer service is terrible. Just, really, really, awful. 

Especially irritating is that it seems that booking from the US causes a problem with the conversion of birthdates — the three flights I’ve booked through the app adjusted our birthdays back one day, requiring us to go through the airline to fix it because, of course, Booking.com customer service was useless. 

I’ve booked my last thing through booking.com. Hopefully I won’t have any more problems because if I do, the app will be pointless to resolve them.

title: Excellent App
text: My favorite travel app for booking hotels and car rentals. Easy, fast and clear information.

title: No refund
text: There was an issue with room availability at the hotel where we booked the room. Hotel apologized and said manager would refund the money due to the confusion. I contacted booking.com and I was told it was the responsibility of the property. I contacted the property and the manager said it was booking.com’s issue. Fast forward several weeks and I am still out of my $78. Both parties refuse to refund my money. It was not my fault there was not a handicap accessible room as advertised on the app. I was stressed due to the fact I am in a wheelchair and needed a place to stay the night. Will not use them again.

title: Please make a way to shorten stay.
text: Just one problem in my short use, why is there no way to shorten my stay. I want to ask for one less day super early but it says nothing is available. How is nothing available even if it’s the room and days I’ve booked? The only solution to this problem for now is calling.  Other than that this app is fantastic and easy to use and understand. Everything is well priced and information is organized making it easy to insure you have everything right. My friends and some family haven’t had a problem yet.

title: Greenwood Traveler
text: I used booking.com app to select the hotel for my upcoming trip to St. Louis, MO and reserve and book my rooms. It was easy to start and finish the process. I will use booking.com in future hotel stays.

title: Hotel booking

title: Great experience
text: I needed a hotel room for my daughters 12th birthday because she wanted a fun sleepover with swimming. I downloaded the app and found the best priced hotel room, which was nicely priced, booked the room and had no issues. As soon as we got to hotel I told them I had already booked on booking.com, they took my name, and got us right into our room. No problems at all! Perfect experience! Will definitely be using booking.com from now on for hotel renting

title: Worst customer service
text: I had an extremely disappointing experience with Booking.com. Their customer service was abysmal, leaving me frustrated and unheard. Additionally, the prices advertised were significantly different from what I actually paid, leading to a sense of deceit and mistrust. My advice: steer clear of Booking.com to avoid unnecessary hassle and potential financial loss.

title: Great app
text: I have been using this app for years. You see the total price with no surprises about cost when you get to your hotel. It even lists options the hotels have in LasVegas if you want to pay extra for services so read those carefully BEFORE you book. And remember the hotel almost always puts a extra deposit on your card when you check in so call the hotel and ask if you are on a tight budget. I have traveled from LA to NY using this app and have even checked pricing when sitting in a hotels parking lot so it’s a great tool when traveling or just looking for a local hotel.

title: DONT USE!!
text: Lost our booking and we kept calling and they would hang up on us.  Had to go to bank and report fraud because we weren’t able to get into our room!! We tried to cancel our booking and we put in the confirmation number they emailed us after we payed and it said “this confirmation number doesn’t exist” Got scammed almost $700!!

title: Great stay
text:
Cute little duplex! Great space, appreciate the laundry pods,dryer sheets,coffee,creamer,sugar,comfortable beds, quick response,less than 10
Minutes to stores. Will definitely be rebooking this place!

title: Art Ranch Fredericksburg
text: Wonderful get away for Spring Break! Beautiful ranch … just what we needed to relax ,rewind and reflect! Shirt drive to Fredericksburg shopping and restaurants. Our girls loved watching out for the deer. Definitely will stay again. The casita accommodated our family of 4. Thank you Amy for being a wonderful host!

title: Excellent Hospitality
text: We were ahead of schedule and were able to check in early with zero hassles.  The manager was a one woman reservation clerk and housekeeper and we appreciated her knowledge of the area and hospitality.  After checking out she allowed us to leave our vehicle parked at the motel while we explored the area and base with our son (a Marine stationed here and the reason for our visit). The rooms were cozy, tidy, and clean with all the amenities we needed for a short visit to the area.  We will stay here again the next time we're in town!

title: Easy to use
text: Awesome!!!!!👍🏿

title: Ugh and ugh
text: Terrible terrible and more terrible will not stay there again. No towels no wash rags no good channels on tv. No good breakfast like they advertise. Bugs on Cellian not enough toilet paper. Bathroom sink nasty. Would not recommend staying here mold on cellian as well.

title: Y.Kendrick
text: Room was very exceptional and clean with a very nice view. Thank you

title: Horrible service
text: This app has disappointed me for the last time. Every time we book somewhere and we have problems with the hotel, booking.com has not been helpful at all! I paid 190 dollars for a room where the staff was rude and my daughter was going to have to sleep on the floor and neither the property nor booking.com care enough to apologize or give me a refund. They offered $27 back out of $190, which is absolutely absurd! Then they tell me to look myself for a surrounding hotel to stay, which I already know are all booked up, instead of just giving me a full refund on somewhere I’m not even going to stay the night at!
